name: Blockz - Number Brick Break
description:
Blockz Shooter is a whole new level bricks breaker game. Break as many tiles as you can!
Enjoy with your friends trying to break the record. This is the best game if you are trying to relax having fun.

Features:
· Endless game.
· Infinite hours of fun.
· Easy to play but hard to master.
· Control the balls trajectory with your finger.

How to play:
· Get coins to buy ballz color.
· Get power ups to make your hits more powerful.
· Swipe your finger to throw the balls and break the bricks.
· Try to break as many bricks as possible before they move down to the bottom.
